Title: Relates to privacy protection policies on internet websites, online services, online applications and mobile applications that collect social security numbers
Summary: Relates to privacy protection policies on internet websites, online services, online applications and mobile applications that collect social security numbers.
LawCode: Add ยง390-bbb, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to printed privacy protection policies on internet websites, online services, online applications and mobile applications that collect social security numbers
